alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Walton, Holmes and Washington Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bonifay to 8 miles south of De Funiak Springs to near Niceville. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Eglin Air Force Base, Bradford, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Ebro, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Whitehead Crossroads, Villa Tasso and Cerrogordo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
